verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: how] to [V: use] [ARG1: a space heater] [ARGM-MNR: safely] millions of people use space heaters in winter but according to authorities they are a leading cause of potentially deadly house fires jamie novak heater thanksgiving the house national fire protection association jeff rossen st paul fire department oklahoma city
